query: SELECT id, name, CASE WHEN data LIKE '%penetrationsState%' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_penetrations, CASE WHEN data LIKE '%sheetMetal%' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_sheet_metal, LENGTH(data) as data_len FROM saved_estimates WHERE id = 60001;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2M93N6eA4z8JVUn.02c0fb067b9a --database Q9FjtgmyfZcDZpNJvvZPkD --execute SELECT id, name, CASE WHEN data LIKE '%penetrationsState%' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_penetrations, CASE WHEN data LIKE '%sheetMetal%' THEN 'YES' ELSE 'NO' END as has_sheet_metal, LENGTH(data) as data_len FROM saved_estimates WHERE id = 60001;
